    public class SurvivalController
extends Controller

    • Method Detail

      • loadGraph

        private void loadGraph()
        Loads the graph of the map

        This method goes through every node and with the help of MapDivision initializes them based on whether there is an obstacle or not. To be more precise, it removes the nodes which are invalid/covered by obstacles.

      • loadGame

        public void loadGame(MapType mapType)
        Description copied from class: Controller
        Loads and starts the game

        Loads the game by providing the type of map to load. It initializes the player and any additional tools, such map division and graph.

        Specified by:
        loadGame in class Controller
        Parameters:
        mapType - type of map the game will be played on

      • getClosestCenter

        public Point2D getClosestCenter(Point2D position,
                                ItemType item)
        Description copied from interface: Services
        Gets the closest center coordinate determined by the straight distance to it from a provided point
        Parameters:
        position - point from where the closest cen position will be looked for
        item - type of item to look for (e.g., ALLY, ENEMY_AREA)
        Returns:
        Point2D object which points to the closest center position of the requested item or the provided position if there is no closest point

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        closest GameCharacter from Side ALLY

      • getFreeArea

        public Point2D getFreeArea(Point2D center,
                           double innerRadius,
                           double outerRadius,
                           double areaSize,
                           Pos pos)
        Description copied from interface: Services
        Gets a random position of a free area requested around some center point

        This method checks if there is a free area of the the requested radius withing a constrained area. Constrained area is determined by a center position and a constraint radius. If pos is set to TOP_LEFT, it will return the top left position of a circle (i.e., x - areaSize, y - areaSize), in all other cases, it returns center position.

        Note: if a moving entity happens to be spawned on top of another moving entity, they both will be pushed away from each other's center position.

        Parameters:
        center - point around which the area should be found
        innerRadius - radius for the center point within which the free area cannot appear
        outerRadius - radius for the center point within which the free area should be looked for
        areaSize - size the free area should have (length of one side of a square)
        pos - TOP_LEFT or CENTER position requested to be returned
        Returns:
        Point2D coordinate of a free area or null if no area is found

      • intersectsObstacles

        public boolean intersectsObstacles(Rectangle path)
        Description copied from interface: Services
        Checks if a given rectangular shape intersects any non-walkable obstacles
        Parameters:
        path - area of intersection to be checked for
        Returns:
        true if there are interactive obstacles within the requested area and false otherwise

      • spawnTriggerAroundPoint

        public boolean spawnTriggerAroundPoint(TriggerType triggerType,
                                       Point2D center,
                                       double innerConstraint,
                                       double outerConstraint)
        Description copied from interface: Services
        Spawns trigger randomly around a given point
        Parameters:
        triggerType - type of trigger to spawn (most power-ups and traps can be spawned)
        center - center position around which the trigger will be spawned
        innerConstraint - inner radius within the trigger won't spawn
        outerConstraint - outer radius within the trigger will spawn
        Returns:
        true if the trigger was spawned successfully and false otherwise
